t: What is brand safety? Definition, examples & how it works | Amazon Ads
s: December 20, 2021 - Brand safety is not a one-time checklist item, but instead is an ongoing process. Brands must regularly assess potential threats to their brand safety. t: Amazon Transparency: Counterfeit and brand protection
